# 1. 使用 hash 做路由

思路：当你分享一个网址给小伙伴时，比如--- xxx.com/#login 用户显示的是登录页面 xxx.com/#signUp 用户显示的是注册页面 方式：使用 window.location.hash 来获取 hash 值，比如--- #login #signUp 就是 hash 值

// index.js
import { useState } from 'react'
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'
function Box1() {
  return <div className="box">登录</div>;
}
function Box2() {
  return <div className="box">注册</div>;
}
function App() {
  // 上来就判断 hash
  const initUi = window.location.hash === "#signUp" ? "注册" : "登录"
  const [Ui, setUi] = useState(initUi)
  const login = () => {
    // js 切成登录 将路径偷偷改成 login
    setUi("登录")
    window.location.hash = "login"
  }
  const signUp = () => {
    setUi("注册")
    window.location.hash = "signUp"
  }
  return (
    <div className="button-wrapper">
      <button onClick={login}>登录</button>
      <button onClick={signUp}>注册</button>
      {Ui === "登录" ? <Box1 /> : <Box2 />}
    </div>
  )
}
const rootElement = document.getElementById("root")
ReactDOM.render(<App />, rootElement)

# 2. react-router

import ReactDOM from "react-dom";
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom";

const rootElement = document.getElementById("root");
function login() {
  return <div>登录</div>;
}
function signUp() {
  return <div>注册</div>;
}
function wel() {
  return <div>欢迎</div>;
}
ReactDOM.render(
  <Router>
    <Link to="login">登录</Link>
    <Link to="signUp">注册</Link>
    <Link to="/">首页</Link>
    <Route path="/login" component={login} />
    <Route path="/signUp" component={signUp} />
    <Route path="/" exact component={wel} />
  </Router>,
  rootElement
);
